scripts.build: npm run build:copy && npm run build:types
scripts.build:copy: rm -rf convex/_generated convex/portal convex/relay convex/slack convex/crons.ts dist && mkdir -p convex dist/convex && cp -R ../../convex/_generated convex/_generated && cp -R ../../convex/portal convex/portal && cp -R ../../convex/relay convex/relay && cp -R ../../convex/slack convex/slack && cp ../../convex/crons.ts convex/crons.ts && cp -R ../../convex/_generated dist/convex/_generated && cp -R ../../convex/portal dist/convex/portal && cp -R ../../convex/relay dist/convex/relay && cp -R ../../convex/slack dist/convex/slack && cp ../../convex/crons.ts dist/convex/crons.ts
